submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, h: List[int], v: List[int]) -> int:
        h = sorted((h[i], i) for i in range(m - 1))
        v = sorted((v[i], i) for i in range(n - 1))
        
        ans = 0
        i, j = m - 2, n - 2
        ch, cv = 0, 0
        while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
            hmx, hi = h[i]
            vmx, vi = v[j]
            if hmx >= vmx:
                ans += (cv + 1) * hmx
                i -= 1
                ch += 1
            else:
                ans += (ch + 1) * vmx
                j -= 1
                cv += 1
        
        while i >= 0:
            hmx, hi = h[i]
            ans += (cv + 1) * hmx
            i -= 1
        
        while j >= 0:
            vmx, vi = v[j]
            ans += (ch + 1) * vmx
            j -= 1
            
        return ans
